Want to Know About Us?

Energymitra is focused on creating a high tech platform which houses high grade solar products, roof top projects and LED products. Being backed by extensive research, core domain expertise & IT enabled platform, this brand has the ability to deliver tailor-made solar solutions to everyone in India.


Energymitra is one of the renowned manufacturers and suppliers of the best quality LED Inverter bulbs.The company is located in Prayagraj(Uttar Pradesh, India). Mr. Saurabh Tripathy (Founder) is the brilliant mind behind the establishment of our organization. He laid the foundation stone in the year 2020.

We Cover the Whole Spectrum

Solar Power Plants

Solar home Lighting System

All Roads Lead to Solar!

Here are a few reasons that Energymitra is the best option for installing solar panel systems in either the home or workplace.

Sustainability

We deliver solutions which are economically advantageous and up to the highest expectations of our customers and partners.

Responsibility

We are responsible toward our natural environment.

Commitment

We commit to bring the best environmentally friendly technologies and to keep developing renewable energy solutions.

Our Mission

Is to develop such tools, products & services for delivering 'POWER of SUN to every Citizen.

Our vision

Our vision is a clean energy running world.

Why Choose Us solar Energy

It's really kind of cool to have solar panels on your roof.

Limited Maintainance

While a solar array does require some maintenance and cleaning to operate at full efficiency, there is virtually no day-to-day maintenance.

Good for the Environment

Solar power is a great way to reduce your carbon footprint

Solar electricity boosts your electricity independence!

Solar Electricity Makes Your Home Go Off-the-Grid

Save on Utility Bills

As more solar energy is produced by a system, there is less dependence needed from a utility company.

Increase Home Value

Having solar arrays on your home can help increase its value.

Solar Power Is A Free Source of Energy

The sun provides us with more energy than we could ever use, and no one can monopolise the sunlight.
